scripts.publish:canary: git checkout canary && git pull && lerna version prerelease --preid canary --force-publish
scripts.publish:canary:major: git checkout canary && git pull && lerna version premajor --preid canary --force-publish
scripts.publish:canary:minor: git checkout canary && git pull && lerna version preminor --preid canary --force-publish
scripts.publish:canary:patch: git checkout canary && git pull && lerna version prepatch --preid canary --force-publish
scripts.clean: lerna clean -y && lerna bootstrap && lerna exec 'rm -rf ./dist'
